title: 10 states given permission to borrow additional Rs 28,204 cr for power sector reforms last fiscal - Economic Times
content: 10 states given permission to borrow additional Rs 28,204 cr for power sector reforms last fiscal  Economic Times
description: In the financial year 2022-23 too, the states can avail the facility of additional borrowing linked to reforms in power sector. An amount of Rs 1,22,551 crore will be available as incentive to the states for undertaking these reforms in 2022-23, it added.
